pages.text: Reaching level 100 $(thing)Imbuing$() grants you the ability to wear the $(thing)Helm of the Ritualist$().$(br)The helmet is unbreakable, gives decent stats, and grants a 50% bonus to all $(thing)Imbuing$() xp gained while worn.$(br2)At level 1000, it gains a fancy improved look.
pages.title: Helm of the Ritualist
